document_data.name: Hemp
document_data.mainbody: '''Hemp''', also known as '''cannabis''', was a variety of plant in the Realms that was cultivated for the purpose of producing a wide variety of items. Many of these uses and means of preparing hemp were closely guarded secrets by herbalists and temples.{{Cite web/theedverse/2020-12-19 - Cannabis in the Realms}}
document_data.Availability:
* This plant was known to grow in the continent of [[Kara-Tur]], such as in the nation of [[Kozakura]].<ref>
* In the [[Island Kingdoms]] of Kara-Tur, hemp was grown on the island of [[Rukun]] and was one of its major exports.<ref>
document_data.Usages:
* Some wove the nettles of hemp to make a [[hemp (fabric)|fabric of the same name]], which was used for clothing and [[rope]]s. The [[korobokuru]] of Kara-Tur were one such group known for doing this.
* Nettles were also woven and twisted together to form baskets and [[net]]s.<ref>
* In some parts of Kara-Tur, thick layers of the fiber were used to construct [[shield]]s.
* Some used hemp for medicinal purposes as the plants could slow blood flow, clear one's head, and quell nausea.
* Hemp had a varied effect on [[demihuman]]s. It had little-to-no effect on [[dwarves]] and [[gnome]]s, no effect at all on [[halfling]]s, acted as a mere painkiller for [[orc]]s, and made [[elves]] violently ill. When used by elves, it could cause cramps, vomiting, and the feeling that one's blood was on fire.
